name: Mini Racers [N64]
description:
MINI RACERS 

"the best game hands down, I know its more clunky and buggy than I remember, but when I was a kid IT was amazing" 

CONTROLS:

WASD to move, SPACE to use Item 

CREDITS:

Coding : VPJ

2D Art : FreshBone, Silber, Water

3D Art : LuisMint, Freshbone

Music+SFX : Feki
